Company: U.S. Dept. of Education, Direct Loan Servicing
Description of incident: A security breach exposed              private information of student loan borrowers from Aug. 20-22 during              a computer software upgrade. Users of the DOE's Direct Loan Web site were              able to view information other than their own if they used certain              options when accessing the program's web pages. SSNs were among the data elements exposed online.  Software company Affiliated Computer Services (ACS) created the technology for the Direct Loan Servicing feature on the DoE's site.
